entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:42 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
